name: Mining - (Made by a father and a daughter)
name_original: Mining - (Made by a father and a daughter)
description:
This game is an experiment and a father and daughter game.
I programmed at Construct 3 and my 8 year old daughter does the sprites.

It has no defeat or victory, only a few diamonds for mining and two large reserves.

Enjoy! ˆ-ˆ

COMANDS:

Move - ARROWS

Mine - Z
